price: Macho yao yatainama chini, fedheha itawafunika. Na hakika walikuwa wakiitwa wasujudu walipo kuwa wazima
arabic: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ
footnotes: Macho yao yameinama chini, yamefunikwa na fedheha. Na duniani walikuwa wakitakiwa wasujudu walipo kuwa wakiweza na wakakataa kusujudu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: khāshiʿatan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kānū yud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi wahum sālimūna
